description: Verify that the Edit Profile page loads correctly when accessing /profile/edit with authenticated user
scenario: Logged-in user navigates to edit profile page to modify their account information
expected_results: Display the complete edit profile page with form fields pre-populated with current user data
procedure:
1. Login with valid user credentials
2. Navigate to profile page
3. Click 'Edit Profile' button
4. Verify navigation to http://localhost:5000/profile/edit
5. Check page title displays 'Edit Profile'
6. Verify form fields are pre-populated with current user data
7. Check all form sections are visible and properly styled

description: Verify the edit profile header displays correctly with pencil-square icon and back button
scenario: User views the edit profile header with cybersecurity-themed design and navigation
expected_results: Display 'Edit Profile' title with pencil-square icon and 'Back to Profile' button
procedure:
1. Navigate to /profile/edit page while logged in
2. Verify edit profile header contains pencil-square icon (bi-pencil-square)
3. Check icon has blue styling and pulse animation (animate-pulse-slow)
4. Verify 'Edit Profile' heading is displayed prominently
5. Check 'Back to Profile' button with gray gradient styling
6. Verify arrow-left icon (bi-arrow-left) in back button
7. Test back button navigation to profile page
8. Check header responsive layout and dark mode styling

description: Verify username input field displays correctly with validation and pre-populated data
scenario: User views and edits username field with proper validation feedback
expected_results: Display username field with current value, validation rules, and proper styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'Username' label is displayed
3. Check username field is pre-populated with user.username value
4. Verify field has required attribute
5. Check help text '3-30 characters, letters, numbers and underscores only'
6. Test focus effects (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500)
7. Verify hover shadow effect (hover:shadow-md)
8. Test field styling in dark mode

description: Verify email address input field displays correctly with validation and pre-populated data
scenario: User views and edits email field with proper email validation
expected_results: Display email field with current value, email validation, and proper styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'Email Address' label is displayed
3. Check email field is pre-populated with user.email value
4. Verify field has type='email' and required attributes
5. Check field styling matches username field
6. Test HTML5 email validation
7. Verify focus and hover effects
8. Test field styling in dark mode

description: Verify password change section displays correctly with proper labeling and optional behavior
scenario: User views password change section as optional part of profile editing
expected_results: Display password change section with clear optional labeling and help text
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify border separator before password section (border-t border-gray-200)
3. Check 'Change Password (Optional)' heading
4. Verify help text 'Leave blank if you don't want to change your password.'
5. Check section has proper spacing and styling
6. Verify section is clearly separated from required fields
7. Test section styling in dark mode

description: Verify new password input field displays correctly with validation guidance
scenario: User enters new password with proper validation feedback
expected_results: Display new password field with security guidance and proper styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'New Password' label is displayed
3. Check field has type='password' attribute
4. Verify placeholder text 'Enter new password (optional)'
5. Check help text 'At least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number'
6. Test field styling consistency with other inputs
7. Verify field is not required initially
8. Test password masking functionality

description: Verify confirm password input field displays correctly with matching validation
scenario: User enters password confirmation with real-time matching validation
expected_results: Display confirm password field with matching validation and proper styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'Confirm New Password' label is displayed
3. Check field has type='password' attribute
4. Verify placeholder text 'Confirm new password'
5. Test field styling matches new password field
6. Enter text in new password field
7. Verify confirm password becomes required when new password has value
8. Test JavaScript validation for password matching

description: Verify current password field displays correctly as required security measure
scenario: User must enter current password to confirm identity before making changes
expected_results: Display current password field with required indicator and security explanation
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'Current Password' label with red asterisk (*)
3. Check field has type='password' and required attributes
4. Verify placeholder text 'Enter your current password to confirm changes'
5. Check help text 'Required to verify your identity before making any changes'
6. Verify field is visually distinct as required
7. Test field styling and focus effects
8. Check divider separator above field (border-t border-gray-200)

description: Verify update profile button displays correctly with loading states and proper styling
scenario: User submits profile changes and observes button behavior
expected_results: Display update button with green gradient styling and loading state functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Verify 'Update Profile' button spans full width (w-full)
3. Check green gradient styling (from-green-600 to-teal-600)
4. Verify check-circle icon (bi-check-circle) is present
5. Test hover effects (hover:from-green-700 hover:to-teal-700, hover:scale-105)
6. Check focus ring styling (focus:ring-4 focus:ring-green-500/25)
7. Test loading state elements (submit-spinner, submit-loading-text)
8. Verify button accessibility and keyboard interaction

description: Verify successful profile update with valid data and current password
scenario: User successfully updates username and/or email with correct current password
expected_results: Profile is updated in database and user receives success message
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Change username to new valid value
3. Change email to new valid address
4. Enter correct current password
5. Click 'Update Profile' button
6. Verify success message 'Profile updated successfully!'
7. Check redirect to profile page (/profile)
8. Verify updated information is displayed on profile page
9. Check database reflects the changes

description: Verify password change functionality works correctly with validation
scenario: User successfully changes password with proper validation and confirmation
expected_results: Password is updated securely and user can login with new password
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Enter strong new password (8+ characters)
3. Enter matching confirmation password
4. Enter correct current password
5. Click 'Update Profile' button
6. Verify success message and redirect
7. Logout and attempt login with old password (should fail)
8. Login with new password (should succeed)
9. Verify password is properly hashed in database

description: Verify username validation enforces format and uniqueness requirements
scenario: User enters various username formats and receives appropriate validation feedback
expected_results: Username validation prevents invalid formats and duplicate usernames
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Test username with less than 3 characters
3. Verify error 'Username must be between 3 and 30 characters.'
4. Test username with more than 30 characters
5. Test username with invalid characters (spaces, symbols)
6. Test username that already exists for another user
7. Verify error 'Username is already taken.'
8. Test valid username format (3-30 chars, alphanumeric + underscore)
9. Verify validation uses is_valid_username() function

description: Verify email validation enforces format and uniqueness requirements
scenario: User enters various email formats and receives appropriate validation feedback
expected_results: Email validation prevents invalid formats and duplicate email addresses
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Test empty email field
3. Verify error 'Please enter a valid email address.'
4. Test email without @ symbol
5. Test malformed email addresses
6. Test email that already exists for another user
7. Verify error 'Email address is already registered.'
8. Test valid email format
9. Check HTML5 email validation works in conjunction

description: Verify password validation enforces security requirements
scenario: User enters various password formats and receives appropriate validation feedback
expected_results: Password validation enforces minimum length and matching requirements
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Enter new password with less than 8 characters
3. Verify error 'Password must be at least 8 characters long.'
4. Enter new password and different confirmation
5. Verify error 'New passwords do not match.'
6. Test JavaScript validation for real-time password matching
7. Verify confirm password field becomes required when new password is entered
8. Test valid password with matching confirmation

description: Verify current password verification prevents unauthorized changes
scenario: User must provide correct current password to make any profile changes
expected_results: Changes are blocked if current password is incorrect
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Make valid changes to username or email
3. Enter incorrect current password
4. Click 'Update Profile' button
5. Verify error 'Current password is incorrect.'
6. Check user remains on edit profile page
7. Enter correct current password
8. Verify changes are accepted and processed
9. Test current password verification for all change scenarios

description: Verify edit profile page requires user authentication and redirects unauthenticated users
scenario: Unauthenticated user attempts to access edit profile page
expected_results: Redirect unauthenticated users to login page with appropriate message
procedure:
1. Ensure user is logged out
2. Navigate directly to http://localhost:5000/profile/edit
3. Verify redirect to login page
4. Check authentication required message or behavior
5. Login with valid credentials
6. Verify successful access to edit profile page
7. Test session timeout scenario
8. Check redirect preservation after login

description: Verify proper handling when database is disabled (Vercel environment)
scenario: User attempts to edit profile in deployment environment with disabled database
expected_results: Display warning message about profile editing unavailability and redirect to home
procedure:
1. Set DISABLE_DATABASE config to True
2. Navigate to /profile/edit page while logged in
3. Verify warning message 'Profile editing is not available in this deployment environment.'
4. Check redirect to home page
5. Verify no edit profile form is displayed
6. Test user experience with clear messaging
7. Check no database operations are attempted
8. Verify graceful fallback behavior

description: Verify CSRF token integration and protection for profile updates
scenario: User submits profile edit form with CSRF protection enabled
expected_results: CSRF token is properly included and validated with form submission
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. View page source and verify csrf_token hidden field
3. Submit form with valid profile changes
4. Verify CSRF token is included in POST request
5. Test form submission without CSRF token (should fail)
6. Check CSRF validation error handling
7. Verify security against CSRF attacks
8. Test CSRF token refresh on page reload

description: Verify JavaScript password validation works correctly for real-time feedback
scenario: User experiences real-time password validation while typing
expected_results: JavaScript provides immediate feedback for password matching and requirements
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Enter text in new password field
3. Verify confirm password field becomes required
4. Enter different text in confirm password field
5. Check browser validation message 'Passwords do not match'
6. Enter matching password in confirm field
7. Verify validation message clears
8. Test password field enabling/disabling behavior
9. Verify JavaScript graceful degradation if disabled

description: Verify edit profile form elements animate correctly on page load
scenario: User observes form appearance animations on edit profile page load
expected_results: Form elements appear in staggered sequence with fade-in animations
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page (clear cache first)
2. Observe animation sequence on page load
3. Verify header animates first (animate-fade-in-up)
4. Check form container animates with 0.1s delay (animate-fade-in-left)
5. Verify username field animates with 0.2s delay
6. Check email field animates with 0.3s delay
7. Verify password section animates with 0.4s delay
8. Check current password and button animate with 0.6s and 0.7s delays
9. Test animation performance and smoothness

description: Verify edit profile page displays correctly in dark mode
scenario: User toggles dark mode and uses edit profile page
expected_results: All elements display properly with dark theme colors and proper contrast
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Toggle dark mode using theme switcher
3. Verify background changes to dark theme (dark:bg-gray-800)
4. Check form fields use dark theme (dark:bg-gray-800)
5. Verify text colors invert properly (dark:text-white)
6. Test input field styling in dark mode
7. Check button gradients work in dark theme
8. Verify border colors adapt (dark:border-gray-600, dark:border-gray-700)
9. Test accessibility and contrast ratios

description: Verify edit profile page is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User accesses edit profile page on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Page adapts properly to different screen sizes while maintaining functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify layout uses max-width constraint (max-w-2xl)
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check form spacing and field sizing
5. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
6. Verify form remains usable on small screens
7. Test touch interactions on mobile
8. Check button size and touch targets meet accessibility guidelines
9. Verify header layout adapts properly
10. Test landscape and portrait orientations

description: Verify proper handling of database errors during profile updates
scenario: Database errors occur during profile update process
expected_results: Graceful error handling with proper logging and user feedback
procedure:
1. Simulate database connection failure during profile update
2. Submit profile changes
3. Verify appropriate error handling
4. Check error message 'An error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again.'
5. Verify user remains on edit profile page
6. Test DatabaseError and general Exception handling
7. Check error logging for debugging
8. Test system recovery from database errors

description: Verify form fields are properly pre-populated with current user data
scenario: User opens edit profile page and sees current information in form fields
expected_results: All form fields display current user data accurately
procedure:
1. Login with user account that has known data
2. Navigate to edit profile page
3. Verify username field shows current user.username
4. Check email field shows current user.email
5. Verify password fields are empty (security)
6. Test with users having various data formats
7. Check data accuracy against database values
8. Verify pre-population works after validation errors

description: Verify profile updates only affect the authenticated user's account
scenario: User can only update their own profile information, not other users' data
expected_results: Profile updates are isolated to current user with proper security
procedure:
1. Login with User A credentials
2. Navigate to edit profile page
3. Update User A's profile information
4. Verify changes apply only to User A's account
5. Login with User B credentials
6. Check User B's profile is unchanged
7. Test direct URL manipulation attempts
8. Verify session security prevents unauthorized updates
9. Check current_user context is properly maintained

description: Verify navigation between profile and edit profile pages works correctly
scenario: User navigates between profile view and edit modes seamlessly
expected_results: Smooth navigation with proper context preservation
procedure:
1. Navigate to profile page
2. Click 'Edit Profile' button
3. Verify navigation to edit profile page
4. Click 'Back to Profile' button
5. Verify return to profile page
6. Test browser back/forward buttons
7. Check URL structure and navigation consistency
8. Verify user context is preserved throughout navigation

description: Verify input fields display proper validation states and feedback
scenario: User sees visual feedback for field validation states
expected_results: Input fields show appropriate styling for valid, invalid, and focused states
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Test focus states on all input fields
3. Verify focus ring styling (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500)
4. Enter invalid data and check error states
5. Enter valid data and check normal states
6. Test hover effects on input fields
7. Verify required field indicators
8. Check field styling consistency across all inputs

description: Verify edit profile page loads efficiently with optimal performance
scenario: User accesses edit profile page and expects fast loading times
expected_results: Page loads within acceptable time limits with all styling and functionality
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to edit profile page
4. Record page load time and performance metrics
5. Verify total load time is under 2 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) is under 1 second
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for render-blocking resources
10. Verify animations don't impact performance significantly

description: Verify edit profile page meets accessibility standards (WCAG)
scenario: User with disabilities accesses edit profile page using assistive technologies
expected_results: Page is fully accessible with proper labels, ARIA attributes, and keyboard navigation
procedure:
1. Navigate to edit profile page
2. Test keyboard navigation through all form elements
3. Verify tab order is logical (username → email → new password → confirm → current → submit)
4. Check all form fields have proper labels
5. Test form with screen reader software
6. Verify focus indicators are visible and clear
7. Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards
8. Test error messages are announced by screen readers
9. Verify form validation errors are accessible
10. Check required field indicators are properly marked
11. Test help text associations with form fields

description: Verify edit profile system meets security best practices and compliance requirements
scenario: Security audit of profile editing functionality and implementation
expected_results: System follows security best practices and prevents common vulnerabilities
procedure:
1. Audit authentication requirements for profile editing
2. Verify current password verification for all changes
3. Check protection against profile enumeration
4. Test for injection vulnerabilities in form inputs
5. Verify proper input sanitization and validation
6. Check CSRF protection implementation
7. Test for session fixation vulnerabilities
8. Verify proper error handling doesn't leak information
9. Check password hashing security (Argon2)
10. Verify compliance with security frameworks (OWASP)
11. Test profile editing against common attack vectors
12. Verify secure communication (HTTPS enforcement)
13. Check data validation prevents XSS and injection attacks
14. Verify username and email uniqueness enforcement
